Articles.Content:
I've been playing KSP since v0.17 or v0.18 but this is my first KSP video.  I use Remote Tech and decided to create a keo-stationary communications network around Kerbin using 3 satellites.  I hope you like the video.

*EDIT - It was pointed out to me that I should have used the sidereal period of 5h 59m 9.4s for my satellites so they don't drift from their keo-stationary positions.  Now I have a topic for my second video.

 

 

 

Edited August 29, 2016 by HumpieDouglas

I have kicked the idea around of installing the remote tech mod.

I am concerned that the orbits of those three satellites would eventually decay and it would turn into a unusable mess.
